text:
We've done some fun virtual events with clients using companies like <https://www.italialikelocals.com/>

It was a great way to connect with clients and gave us a stronger connection with them.

elements.text: We've done some fun virtual events with clients using companies like
It was a great way to connect with clients and gave us a stronger connection with them.

text: In pre-COVID times, my creative agency did host an occasional client party (for the agency's 5th anniversary) and a quarterly in-person education series. The parties were purely social and allowed for some facetime and to showcase our office (which may not make sense if you're remote). The quarterly education sessions actually worked really well and allowed us to connect with current and prospective clients. The ones that worked best were when we held the sessions out in the community and included our clients in the content, for instance inviting several to speak on a panel.
